page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT MINING ,SERVICES
page.content: The main employment in the area used to be mining.We can see this from the number of disused mine shafts, particularly in the Mount Pleasant area. A mineral railway used to run past Thursfield Lodge but this has now been taken up.Most of the area is now used for farming,this is now the main employment in the area.Other jobs are small shops,garages,pubs,schools and churches.There is a milk depot where a number of people are employed to drive milk floats. There is also a small clothing factory in the Dales Green area. There are several building sites employing people as bricklayers, builders and carpenters.There are also council workers who drive the buses through the area,mend the roads,clean the streets and empty the dustbins.Some people work as postmen in the area.
